Chapters.Title: Sir Laurence Olivier Returns to Hollywood
Kirk Douglas Arrives in New York

Item.Title: I Am Spartacus: A Conversation with Kirk Douglas
Interview with Jean Simmons
Item.Description: During this time period, Universal's publicity produced "open-ended" talent interviews that could be customized across local television stations. Periods of silence in this interview indicate where local newscasters would insert their own voice to give the appearance that they were talking with Ms. Simmons directly.
